CustomField.description: Determines whether messages are delivered using a background process when the sender specifies that they are to be delivered now rather than later. If messages are scheduled for delivery later, the messages are delivered using a background process and this setting has no effect. When Capacity is selected, messages are delivered using a background process if the number of messages to be delivered exceeds the value set in the Synchronous Delivery Capacity field. The default value is Never.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Determines whether messages are delivered using a background process when the sender specifies that they are to be delivered now.
CustomField.label: Deliver Using Background Process
